SEARCH
Package com.example.sprite.Models

Class Organizer

java.lang.Object
com.example.sprite.Models.User
com.example.sprite.Models.Organizer
public class Organizer extends User
Represents an organizer user who can create and manage events.

Organizers have the ability to:

  • Create new events
  • Manage their created events
  • Delete events they have created
  • Run lotteries for event registration

This class extends User and maintains a list of events created by the organizer.

    • selectEntrants

      public List<String> selectEntrants(Event event, int numOfAttendees)
      Randomly selects a specified number of entrants from the waiting list. Selected entrants are moved from the waiting list to the selected attendees list.
      Parameters:
      event - The event for which to select entrants
      numOfAttendees - The number of entrants to select from the waiting list
      Returns:
      The list of selected entrant IDs

    • exportCSV

      public String exportCSV(Event event)
      Exports event entrant data to CSV format. Includes event title, selected attendees, confirmed attendees, and cancelled attendees.
      Parameters:
      event - The event whose entrant data should be exported
      Returns:
      A CSV-formatted string containing the event entrant data
